GREETINGS.SUMMARY: I design simple software solutions and solve problems by coding beautiful things.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.FIRST_PARAGRAPH: Learning new things is what makes me better day by day. I'm always working on a new wiser version of me. My goal is to wake up different everyday with new perspectives and much closer to what I want. Professionally, I come to work willing to do my best because I believe there is a lot to discover, teach and be thought.
ABOUT.SECOND_PARAGRAPH: Over the years I've become a passionate .NET developer with focus on cloud development. With the teams I work with, I help foster a left-shift culture embracing best practices and processes to deliver quality code securerly.
